fields.Background\n:
Although much of the Scarlet Witch's true origins remain elusive to her thanks to
manipulations by others, she can still recall her early days as a child with her twin brother
Pietro. The two lived on Wundagore Mountain in Eastern Europe, believing themselves born
as mutants to a Romani couple named the Maximoffs. Given the name Wanda, she lived for a
short time in childish innocence until local troubles involving her parents separated her and her
brother from them and forced her to hide her growing powers.
fields.Strengths\n:
The source of Wanda's unnatural abilities stem from a two-fold base; unparalleled mastery of
actual magic and an innate power to warp reality.

Due to exposure to mystic energies and forces at an early age, Wanda may reshape reality to
various extremes. Known as a "hex" in her formative years as an Avenger, the Scarlet Witch
believed she used the ability to affect probabilities for a positive benefit to herself, though at
times to imprecise outcomes. Later, she mastered the ability and began to understand it as a
literal altering of reality.

In addition, Wanda trained under other magicians and spellcasters to become proficient in
magic-use, which manifests from incantations and spells. To this end, she has become one of
the most proficient sorceresses on Earth.
fields.Weaknesses\n:
Though she does not possess a quite-so specific rogues gallery as many of her fellow costume
champions, the Scarlet Witch can claim a few immediate enemies from her years with the Aven
and her own personal trials.

The powerful mutant known as Magneto subverted Wanda at an early age to not only believe h rself to
be a mutant, but also his daughter. Wanda eventually rebelled against the villain's manipulation to
ultimately confront him whenever encountered and act as a bulwark to his schemes. Doctor Do
another dominant personality in Wanda's life, desired her powers for himself, and betrayed her hen
she sought him out once to help her uncover missing memories. Later, Doom closeted her in his native
country after a dramatic event, taking advantage of the amnesia she then suffered under and
proclaiming his supposed affections for her.

The enetic enius called the Hi h Evolutiona has also caused miser in the Scarlet Witch's Ii
claiming responsibility for her abilities and confusing her further as to her and her brother's parentage.
